name: Lowell Fulson
description: '''Lowell Fulson''' (March 31, 1921{{snd}}March 7, 1999) was an American [[blues]] guitarist and songwriter, in the [[West Coast blues]] tradition. He also recorded for contractual reasons as '''Lowell Fullsom''' and '''Lowell Fulsom'''. After [[T-Bone Walker]], he was the most important figure in West Coast blues in the 1940s and 1950s.
